    • Method Detail

      • update

        public boolean update(java.lang.String token,
                      java.lang.String sessionId)
               throws MPCException,
                      java.io.IOException
        MPC Key is being generated or MPC Signing is operated.
        If the process is complete or stopped, true is returned.
        True does not guarantee that everything has been successfully executed.
        So look out for isSuccess() or check to see if it returned null for getMPCKey() or getMPCSigning () for a successful operation.
        Parameters:
        token - MPC Server access token
        sessionId - Session ID
        Returns:
        Task complete or stop task: true / in progress: false
        Throws:
        MPCException - MPCException
        java.io.IOException - Unstable network or error during data processing

      • getStep

        public int getStep()
        Call for current step.
        CreateGroup step -1 ~ 4
        MPCSigning step -1 ~ 6
        Returns:
        current step

      • isSuccess

        public boolean isSuccess()
        successful or has failed.
        Returns:
        Success: true / Fail: false

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete()
        Check whether MPC operation is completed
        Returns:
        complete: true / in processing: false
